title: Serif — Super Natural
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this typeface is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BAhbCFsHOgZmIh00ZDZhZGU1ZjQ1ZDhiYjdlMWUwMDAwMjVbCDoGcDoKdGh1bWIiCjEwMDB4Wwc6BmU6CGpwZw_5789.jpg)

Font: 

 Else NPL 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145348/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: It looks like **[Else NPL (Light or Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145348/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Else%20NPL%20Light%20-%20Regular&fid=17d2edce26ebc1cd4161eb8b252f6f67&fsize=60&text=SUPER%20NATURAL&wrap=2)** by Robert Norton (1982) available from Adobe & Linotype
